statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE email_address = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_interactions WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT MAX(interaction_timestamp) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(interaction_timestamp) FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(customer_id), interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING interaction_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_id, email_address, interaction_timestamp FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT MAX(interaction_timestamp) FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, interaction_timestamp)) AS average_days_since_last_interaction FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('click', 'view') GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type HAVING interaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, DATE_FORMAT(interaction_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d') AS interaction_date FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions WHERE MONTH(interaction_timestamp) = 1 GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, DATE_FORMAT(interaction_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d') AS interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';

SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM customer_interactions WHERE MONTH(interaction_timestamp) = 1 GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type HAVING interaction_count > 3;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM customer_interactions WHERE YEAR(interaction_timestamp) = 2022;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_emails
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_emails
SELECT interaction_time, interaction_type FROM customer_emails
SELECT * FROM email_engagement
SELECT email_subject, sent_time FROM email_engagement
SELECT open_count, click_count FROM email_engagement
SELECT customer_id, email_address, interaction_time FROM customer_emails
SELECT email_id, email_subject, open_count FROM email_engagement
SELECT * FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT email_address, interaction_type FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM email_engagement WHERE open_count > 10
SELECT email_id, email_subject, click_count FROM email_engagement WHERE click_count < 5
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_emails WHERE interaction_time < '2022-01-01'
SELECT email_id, email_subject FROM email_engagement WHERE sent_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_id FROM customer_emails ORDER BY interaction_time DESC
SELECT email_id FROM email_engagement ORDER BY open_count ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_emails LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM email_engagement LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(open_count) FROM email_engagement
SELECT MAX(open_count), MIN(click_count) FROM email_engagement
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_emails
SELECT * FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT email_address, interaction_time FROM customer_emails WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, interaction_time FROM customer_emails WHERE interaction_time > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email_address, interaction_time FROM customer_emails WHERE interaction_type = 'interaction' AND interaction_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM customer_emails;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), interaction_time)) AS avg_interaction_age FROM customer_emails;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, open_count, click_count FROM customer_emails JOIN email_engagement ON customer_id = email_id;
SELECT c.*, e.email_subject FROM customer_emails c JOIN email_engagement e ON c.customer_id = e.email_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.email_address, e.open_count, e.click_count FROM customer_emails c INNER JOIN email_engagement e ON c.customer_id = e.email_id WHERE e.open_count > 0 AND e.click_count > 0;
SELECT c.customer_id, e.email_subject, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_emails c JOIN email_engagement e ON c.customer_id = e.email_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, e.email_subject;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM customer_emails UNION SELECT email_id, email_subject, sent_time, 'email' AS interaction_type FROM email_engagement;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT email_id FROM email_engagement);
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT email_id FROM email_engagement WHERE click_count > 10);
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT email_id FROM email_engagement WHERE open_count > 5);
SELECT e.*, c.customer_id, c.interaction_time FROM email_engagement e LEFT JOIN customer_emails c ON e.email_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT e.*, c.customer_id, c.interaction_time FROM email_engagement e RIGHT JOIN customer_emails c ON e.email_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(open_count) AS total_opens, SUM(click_count) AS total_clicks FROM customer_emails JOIN email_engagement ON customer_id = email_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(open_count) AS avg_opens, AVG(click_count) AS avg_clicks FROM customer_emails JOIN email_engagement ON customer_id = email_id GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, email_address, interaction_time, interaction_type, 'customer' AS entity_type FROM customer_emails UNION ALL SELECT email_id, email_subject, sent_time, 'email' AS interaction_type, 'email' AS entity_type FROM email_engagement;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id = (SELECT MAX(customer_id) FROM customer_emails);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM emails;
SELECT email_subject, email_body FROM emails;
SELECT * FROM email_engagement;
SELECT engagement_id, customer_id, email_id FROM email_engagement;
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_date FROM email_engagement;
SELECT customer_name, email_subject FROM customers INNER JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.email_id;

SELECT customer_name, email_subject, engagement_type FROM customers INNER JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.email_id INNER JOIN email_engagement ON customers.customer_id = email_engagement.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Opened';
SELECT customer_name, email_subject FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT email_subject, email_body FROM emails WHERE email_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email_subject, engagement_type FROM customers INNER JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.email_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emails ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_engagement ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_subject FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, email_subject, engagement_type FROM customers INNER JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.email_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT e.email_subject, e.email_body, ce.engagement_type FROM emails e INNER JOIN email_engagement ce ON e.email_id = ce.email_id WHERE ce.customer_id = 3;

SELECT c.customer_name, e.email_subject, ce.engagement_type, ce.engagement_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN email_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id INNER JOIN emails e ON ce.email_id = e.email_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, e.email_subject, ce.engagement_type, ce.engagement_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN email_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id INNER JOIN emails e ON ce.email_id = e.email_id WHERE c.customer_id = 4;

SELECT c.customer_name, e.email_subject, ce.engagement_type, ce.engagement_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN email_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id INNER JOIN emails e ON ce.email_id = e.email_id WHERE c.customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_engagements, ce.customer_id FROM email_engagement ce GROUP BY ce.customer_id;
SELECT MAX(engagement_date) as last_engagement_date FROM email_engagement WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_engagements FROM email_engagement GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(engagement_date) as first_engagement_date FROM email_engagement GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM email_engagement;

SELECT e.email_subject, e.send_date, c.customer_name FROM emails e INNER JOIN email_engagement ce ON e.email_id = ce.email_id INNER JOIN customers c ON ce.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 6;

SELECT c.customer_name, e.email_subject, ce.engagement_type, ce.engagement_date FROM customers c LEFT JOIN email_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id LEFT JOIN emails e ON ce.email_id = e.email_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(*) as total_engagements FROM customers c LEFT JOIN email_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, e.email_subject, ce.engagement_type, ce.engagement_date FROM customers c LEFT JOIN email_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id LEFT JOIN emails e ON ce.email_id = e.email_id WHERE ce.customer_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email IN (SELECT email FROM emails WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01');

SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(LENGTH(e.email_body)) as total_characters FROM emails e INNER JOIN email_engagement ce ON e.email_id = ce.email_id INNER JOIN customers c ON ce.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT e.email_id) as total_emails_sent FROM emails e INNER JOIN email_engagement ce ON e.email_id = ce.email_id INNER JOIN customers c ON ce.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM marketing_emails;
SELECT subject, send_date FROM marketing_emails;
SELECT * FROM email_interactions;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM email_interactions;
SELECT * FROM email_clicks;
SELECT click_date, link_clicked FROM email_clicks;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT email_id, subject FROM marketing_emails WHERE send_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM email_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT click_id, link_clicked FROM email_clicks WHERE click_date >= '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM marketing_emails WHERE opened = true;
SELECT * FROM email_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'clicked';
SELECT * FROM email_clicks WHERE link_clicked LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT count(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT avg(opened::int) AS average_open_rate FROM marketing_emails;
SELECT distinct interaction_type FROM email_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS total_interactions FROM email_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING count(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM marketing_emails WHERE opened = TRUE;
SELECT email_id, subject, body FROM marketing_emails WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM email_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM email_clicks WHERE click_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM email_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'open';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM email_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;

SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM email_interactions JOIN email_clicks ON email_interactions.interaction_id = email_clicks.interaction_id WHERE click_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATE_PART('day', interaction_date::timestamp) - DATE_PART('day', send_date::timestamp)) AS avg_response_time FROM email_interactions JOIN marketing_emails ON email_interactions.email_id = marketing_emails.email_id GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks, SUM(CASE WHEN interaction_type = 'open' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_opens FROM email_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT first_name, last_name, opened, send_date, click_date FROM customers JOIN email_interactions ON customers.customer_id = email_interactions.customer_id JOIN email_clicks ON email_interactions.interaction_id = email_clicks.interaction_id WHERE click_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(CASE WHEN interaction_type = 'click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS click_rate FROM email_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT email_id, subject, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM marketing_emails JOIN email_interactions ON marketing_emails.email_id = email_interactions.email_id JOIN email_clicks ON email_interactions.interaction_id = email_clicks.interaction_id GROUP BY email_id, subject;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(interaction_date) AS first_interaction_date, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM email_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT email_id) AS total_emails_sent FROM email_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT subject) AS email_subjects FROM email_interactions JOIN marketing_emails ON email_interactions.email_id = marketing_emails.email_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM email_interactions GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type;
SELECT recipient_ids[1] AS main_recipient, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM marketing_emails GROUP BY main_recipient ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT opened, AVG(CASE WHEN interaction_type = 'click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS click_rate FROM email_interactions GROUP BY opened ORDER BY click_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions;
SELECT * FROM Emails_Sent;
SELECT * FROM Email_Responses;
SELECT * FROM Email_Clicks;
SELECT * FROM Email_Conversions;
SELECT email FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT count(*) FROM Emails_Sent WHERE sent_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_time FROM Email_Responses WHERE response_type = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM Email_Clicks WHERE click_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT conversion_rate FROM Email_Conversions WHERE conversion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email_subject FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'email';
SELECT count(*) FROM Emails_Sent WHERE sent_date = '2022-02-01';
SELECT response_date, response_time FROM Email_Responses WHERE response_type = 'negative';
SELECT * FROM Email_Clicks WHERE email_id = 456;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT max(click_time) FROM Email_Clicks;
SELECT * FROM Email_Conversions WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, response_type FROM Email_Responses WHERE response_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'email';
SELECT avg(conversion_rate) FROM Email_Conversions WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT distinct email_subject FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_type='purchase';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id = 123456;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM Customer_Interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Emails_Sent JOIN Email_Responses ON Emails_Sent.email_id = Email_Responses.email_id;
SELECT Email_Responses.email_id, COUNT(*) FROM Email_Responses JOIN Email_Clicks ON Email_Responses.email_id = Email_Clicks.email_id GROUP BY Email_Responses.email_id;
SELECT Email_Responses.email_id, SUM(Email_Clicks.clicks) FROM Email_Responses JOIN Email_Clicks ON Email_Responses.email_id = Email_Clicks.email_id GROUP BY Email_Responses.email_id;
SELECT Email_Responses.email_id, AVG(Email_Clicks.clicks) FROM Email_Responses JOIN Email_Clicks ON Email_Responses.email_id = Email_Clicks.email_id GROUP BY Email_Responses.email_id;
SELECT email_id, COUNT(*) FROM Email_Conversions GROUP BY email_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Emails_Sent WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Email_Responses WHERE response_type='positive' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Email_Clicks WHERE clicks > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM Email_Conversions WHERE conversion_type='purchase' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_type='visit' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT Customer_Interactions.date, COUNT(*) FROM Emails_Sent JOIN Customer_Interactions ON Emails_Sent.customer_id = Customer_Interactions.customer_id GROUP BY Customer_Interactions.date;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(Customer_Interactions.rating) FROM Customer_Interactions GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT Customer_Interactions.customer_id, AVG(Customer_Interactions.rating) FROM Customer_Interactions JOIN Email_Conversions ON Customer_Interactions.customer_id = Email_Conversions.customer_id GROUP BY Customer_Interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM Email_Responses JOIN Email_Conversions ON Email_Responses.email_id = Email_Conversions.email_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Emails_Sent WHERE email_type='newsletter';
SELECT * FROM Email_Responses WHERE response_type='negative' ORDER BY date DESC;
